clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy of Cetuximab in Combination With Irinotecan and 5- FU/FA in Treatment of Metastatic Gastric Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: An Open-label, Non-randomized Phase II Trial of Cetuximab in Combination With Irinotecan and 5-FU/FA for Patients With Metastatic Gastric Cancer

brief_summary.textblock: Based on the current promising results with irinotecan and cetuximab in patients with recurrent metastatic colorectal cancer, and the excellent results of Irinotecan and 5-FU in gastric cancer , the present clinical study to evaluate the overall response rate, the time to progression and the overall survival of the combined treatment of cetuximab and irinotecan and 5-FU in patients with esophagogastric cancer is urgently needed.

detailed_description.textblock: Cetuximab will be analysed with biological markers

clinical_study.condition: Adenocarcinoma of Stomach or Esophagogastric Junction

arm_group.description: Treatment with combination of Cetuximab and Irinotecan 5-FU

intervention.description: Cetuximab loading dose 400 mg/m² weekly dose 250 mg/m² Irinotecan 80 mg/m2 i.v. over 2 hours day 1, 8, 15, 22, 29, 36 Folinic acid 200 mg/m2 over 24 hours day 1, 8, 15, 22, 29, 36 FA will be given as sodium folinate 5-FU 1500 mg/m2 continuous infusion over 24 hours day 1, 8, 15, 22, 29, 36
